meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>company</kanji> <kanji>leader</kanji> is the <vocabulary>company president</vocabulary>. Be sure to greet your 社長 with a hearty good morning when they stumble in!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
